title: Is one of the candidates of the Michigan State Senate defending men who have sex with underage girls?
subtitle: One of the candidates of the Michigan State Senate said that his Facebook account was hacked and a series of disturbing articles were the result of an attempt to sabotage his political life.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The Michigan State Senate candidate wrote that it was "natural" for adult men to marry and have sex with pre-adult girls.
